alert.note: Alert for Nuckolls; Thayer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 4:10PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Nuckolls and southern Thayer Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 410 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ruskin to near Nelson. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Ruskin around 415 PM CDT. Deshler around 425 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Hardy, Byron, Chester and Hubbell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
